panels.description:
Encoded - bytes encoded and ready to send
Sent - number of bytes sent
File - number of bytes read from files
Read - number of bytes read
panels.title: Promtail Bytes Rate
Promtail - Rate of Bytes and Lines Read

panels.description: According to documentation, lines_received metric is based on entries not necessarily lines as each entry can have more than one line of text
panels.title: Loki (distributor) - Rate of Total Bytes and Entries Received
Loki (distributor) - Rate of Batch Appends Sent to Ingesters

panels.description: Refers to the total number of unique time series currently stored by Loki.
panels.title: Loki Store Series Total

panels.description: Amount of logs in the ingester temporary storage
panels.title: Loki Ingester Chunk Bytes

panels.description: Amount of logs in Loki's long term storage backend
panels.title: Loki Chunk Store Bytes

alert.name: The number of streams in Loki is above 5000

panels.description: The total number of streams created per tenant. Should not increase too much.
panels.title: Loki Current Ingester Streams

alert.name: Loki has emitted error/warning messages in the last 5m

panels.description: Total number of messages logged by Loki itself
panels.title: Number of error/warning messages logged by Loki itself
Error/warning messages logged by Loki itself

alert.name: Loki distributor has failed to send batches to ingesters

panels.title: Loki (distributor) - failed batch appends sent to ingesters

alert.name: Promtail has emitted error/warning messages in the last 5m

panels.description: Total number of messages logged by Promtail
panels.title: Error/warning messages logged by Promtail

alert.name: Promtail has dropped logs in the last 5m

panels.description: Number of log entries dropped because failed to be sent to the Loki ingester after all retries.
panels.title: Promtail - Rate of Dropped Log Entries

panels.description: Number of bytes dropped because failed to be sent to the Loki ingester after all retries.
panels.title: Promtail - Rate of Dropped Bytes
Promtail - Rate of Total Bytes and Entries Dropped
